mapper.select: /* ctDept */ SELECT * FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY FIELD(PATH, '1000') DESC, ORDER_SN
/* getDeptList */ SELECT DEPT_SEQ, replace(PATH_NAME, '|', ' > ') AS DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO DI WHERE DI.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY FIELD(DEPT_SEQ, #{deptSeq}) DESC,DI.DEPT_LEVEL, DI.ORDER_SN
mapper.update: /* updOneFileInfo */ UPDATE CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO SET FILE_UUID = #{fileUUID}, FILE_ORG_NAME = #{fileOrgName}, FILE_PATH = #{filePath}, FILE_SIZE = #{fileSize}, FILE_EXT = #{fileExt}, MOD_DATE = NOW(), MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileNo}
mapper.select: /* getApprovalDocHwpFile */ SELECT FILE_NO, FILE_CD, FILE_UUID, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_EXT, EMP_SEQ, REG_EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileNo}
mapper.insert:
/* insFileInfo */ INSERT INTO CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO ( FILE_CD, FILE_UUID, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_EXT, EMP_SEQ, DOC_ID, CONTENT_ID, REG_EMP_SEQ, FR_KEY ) VALUES
( #{item.fileCd}, #{item.fileUUID}, REPLACE(#{item.fileOrgName}, '''', ''), #{item.filePath}, #{item.fileSize}, #{item.fileExt}, #{item.empSeq},
#{item.docId}, null,
#{item.contentId}, null,
#{item.empSeq},
#{item.frKey} 0
)

/* insFileInfoOne */ INSERT INTO CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO ( FILE_CD, FILE_UUID, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_EXT, EMP_SEQ, DOC_ID, CONTENT_ID, REG_EMP_SEQ, FR_KEY ) VALUES ( #{fileCd}, #{fileUUID}, #{fileOrgName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileExt}, #{empSeq},
#{docId}, null,
#{contentId}, null,
#{empSeq},
#{frKey} 0
)
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_COMMON' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_FILE_INFO'
mapper.select: /* getContentFileOne */ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileNo}
/* getContentFileList */ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_NO in(${fileNo})
mapper.delete: /* getContentFileDelOne */ DELETE FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileNo}
/* delContentFileOne */ DELETE FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_CD = #{fileCd} AND CONTENT_ID = #{contentId} AND FILE_ORG_NAME = #{fileOrgName}
mapper.select: /* commonCodeList */ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_COM_CODE A LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_COM_GROUP_CODE B ON A.CM_GROUP_CODE_ID = B.CM_GROUP_CODE_ID WHERE B.CM_GROUP_CODE = #{cmGroupCode}
/* getDeptSeqMax */ SELECT MAX(CAST(DEPT_SEQ AS SIGNED INTEGER) + 1) FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO
mapper.insert: /* setDeptInfo */ INSERT INTO CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO ( DEPT_SEQ, LANG_CODE, GROUP_SEQ, COMP_SEQ, BIZ_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, PARENT_DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_LEVEL, ADDR, DETAIL_ADDR, PATH, PATH_NAME, USE_YN, CREATE_SEQ, CREATE_DATE, ORG_TYPE, ORDER_SN ) VALUES ( #{deptSeq}, 'kr', 'camtic_new', '1212', '1000', #{deptName}, #{parentDeptSeq}, #{deptLevel}, '전주시 덕진구', '유상로 67', #{path}, #{pathName}, 'Y', #{empSeq}, NOW(), 'D', #{sortSn} )
mapper.update: /* setDeptInfoUpd */ UPDATE CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO SET DEPT_NAME = #{deptName}, ORDER_SN = #{deptSortSn}, MODIFY_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MODIFY_DATE = NOW() WHERE DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}
/* setTeamInfoUpd */ UPDATE CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO SET DEPT_NAME = #{teamName}, ORDER_SN = #{teamSortSn}, MODIFY_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MODIFY_DATE = NOW() WHERE DEPT_SEQ = #{teamSeq}
UPDATE CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO SET USE_YN = 'N', MODIFY_SEQ = #{empSeq}, MODIFY_DATE = NOW() WHERE DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_LEVEL = 2

SELECT M.MENU_ID, M.UPPER_MENU_ID, M.MENU_NAME, M.MENU_TYPE, M.SORT, M.MENU_DEPTH, M.MENU_PATH, M.MENU_ICON, M.ACTIVE, M.LANG, M.MENU_NAME TEXT, M.MENU_NAME_PATH, M.MENU_ID_PATH, M.MENU_CHILDREN_YN, M.MENU_FULL_PATH, FM.FV_MENU_ID FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_MENU_INFO M JOIN ( SELECT MENU_ID FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_MENU_AUTHORITY_GROUP MAG JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_MENU_ALLOW_ACCESS MAA ON MAA.AUTHORITY_GROUP_ID = MAG.AUTHORITY_GROUP_ID JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_MENU_AUTHORITY_GRANT MAGU ON MAG.AUTHORITY_GROUP_ID = MAGU.AUTHORITY_GROUP_ID AND EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} AND MAGU.ACTIVE = 'Y' ) MAGU ON M.MENU_ID = MAGU.MENU_ID LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FAVORITE_MENU FM ON M.MENU_ID = FM.MENU_ID AND FM.REG_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} WHERE ACTIVE = 'Y' AND M.MENU_DEPTH NOT IN (0, 1) AND ( M.MENU_DEPTH != 2 OR (M.MENU_DEPTH = 2 AND M.MENU_CHILDREN_YN = 'N') ) AND M.MENU_NAME_PATH LIKE CONCAT('%', #{menuName}, '%') GROUP BY MENU_ID ORDER BY MENU_FULL_PATH
mapper.insert: /* setFavoriteMenuInsert */ INSERT INTO CAM_COMMON.DJ_FAVORITE_MENU ( MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_PATH, MENU_NAME_PATH, REG_EMP_SEQ, REG_DATE, MOD_DATE ) SELECT b.MENU_ID, b.MENU_NAME, b.MENU_PATH, b.MENU_NAME_PATH, #{empSeq} AS REG_EMP_SEQ, NOW() AS REG_DATE, NOW() AS MOD_DATE FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_MENU_INFO b WHERE b.MENU_ID = #{menuID}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(FM.FV_MENU_ID) FROM CAM_COMMON.dj_menu_info MI JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FAVORITE_MENU FM ON MI.MENU_ID = FM.MENU_ID WHERE MI.ACTIVE = "Y" AND FM.REG_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}

SELECT (SELECT MENU_ID FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_MENU_INFO WHERE MENU_TYPE = 'a' AND MENU_DEPTH = 1 LIMIT 1) AS UPPER_MENU_ID, A.* FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FAVORITE_MENU A WHERE A.REG_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} order by A.REG_DATE DESC

SELECT (SELECT MENU_ID FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_MENU_INFO WHERE MENU_TYPE = 'a' AND MENU_DEPTH = 1 LIMIT 1) AS UPPER_MENU_ID, A.* FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FAVORITE_MENU A WHERE A.REG_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} order by A.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 9
mapper.delete: /*fvMenuDelete*/ DELETE FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FAVORITE_MENU WHERE REG_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} and MENU_ID = #{menuID}
mapper.insert:
/*insFileUpload*/ INSERT INTO CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO ( FILE_CD, FILE_UUID, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_EXT, EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{fileCd}, #{fileUuid}, #{fileOrgName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileExt}, #{empSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_COMMON' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_FILE_INFO'
mapper.update: /*updFileOwner*/ UPDATE CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO SET CONTENT_ID = #{payAppSn} WHERE FILE_PATH = #{filePath} AND FILE_CD = 'useCard'
/*updFileOwnerCustom*/ UPDATE CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO SET CONTENT_ID = #{snackInfoSn} WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileNo} AND FILE_CD = 'useCard'
/*updFileOwnerNull*/ UPDATE CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO SET CONTENT_ID = NULL WHERE CONTENT_ID = CONCAT("'", #{payAppSn}, "'") AND FILE_CD = 'useCard'
mapper.select: /* getAlarmList */ SELECT AL_ID, SND_EMP_NM, SND_DEPT_NM, TITLE, CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as REG_DATE, URL, CHECK_YN, LIST_DEL_YN FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_ALARM WHERE RCV_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} AND LIST_DEL_YN = 'N' AND ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 5;
mapper.insert:
/* setAlarm */ INSERT INTO CAM_COMMON.DJ_ALARM ( CONTENT, RCV_EMP_SEQ, SND_EMP_SEQ, TITLE, URL, SND_EMP_NM, SND_DEPT_SEQ, SND_DEPT_NM ) VALUES ( #{ntContent}, #{recEmpSeq}, #{sdEmpSeq}, #{ntTitle}, #{ntUrl}, #{SND_EMP_NM}, #{SND_DEPT_SEQ}, #{SND_DEPT_NM} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_COMMON' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_ALARM'
mapper.update: /* setAlarmCheck */ UPDATE CAM_COMMON.DJ_ALARM SET CHECK_YN = 'Y', CHECK_DT = NOW(), LIST_DEL_YN = 'Y', MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE 1=1 AND AL_ID = #{alId}
/* setAlarmAllCheck */ UPDATE CAM_COMMON.DJ_ALARM SET CHECK_YN = 'Y', CHECK_DT = NOW() WHERE RCV_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}
mapper.insert:
/* setPsCheck */ INSERT INTO CAM_COMMON.DJ_PS_CHECK ( TYPE, SND_DEPT_SEQ, SND_DEPT_NAME, SND_EMP_SEQ, SND_EMP_NAME, RCV_EMP_SEQ, TYPE_URL, FR_KEY ) VALUES ( #{psType}, #{SND_DEPT_SEQ}, #{SND_DEPT_NM}, #{sdEmpSeq}, #{SND_EMP_NM}, #{recEmpSeq}, #{ntUrl}, #{frKey} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_COMMON' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PS_CHECK'
mapper.select: /*getFileData*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_NO = #{fileSn}
/*getJangCodeList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_JANG_CODE WHERE BUDGET_VAL = #{budgetVal}
/*getGwanCodeList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_GWAN_CODE WHERE BUDGET_VAL = #{budgetVal}
/*getHangCodeList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_HANG_CODE WHERE BUDGET_VAL = #{budgetVal}
/*getJangInfo*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_JANG_CODE WHERE JANG_SN = #{pk}
/*getGwanInfo*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_GWAN_CODE WHERE GWAN_SN = #{pk}
/*getHangInfo*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_HANG_CODE WHERE HANG_SN = #{pk}
mapper.insert: /*insHangInfo*/ INSERT INTO CAM_COMMON.DJ_HANG_CODE ( HANG_NM, HANG_CD, HANG_JB_CD, HANG_BI_CD, HANG_CONT, BUDGET_VAL ) VALUES ( #{hangNm}, #{hangCd}, #{hangJbCd}, #{hangBiCd}, #{hangCont}, #{budgetVal} )
